General.Name: Lavide Holding NV
General.Description: Lavide Holding N.V. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in the provision of integrated information technology solutions for medium to large-sized companies and organizations. The company was formerly known as Qurius N.V. and changed its name to Lavide Holding N.V. in July 2013. Lavide Holding N.V. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Sluis, the Netherlands.
